Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.View

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.View.GameView
public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
This class stores in the client some basic information of the model that the view needs in order to interact with the user
